first_para: Gareth Thomas (born September 25, 1954) is a Labour Party politician in the United Kingdom. He was Member of Parliament for Clwyd West 1997-2005.

full.extract: Gareth Thomas (born September 25, 1954) is a Labour Party politician in the United Kingdom. He was Member of Parliament for Clwyd West 1997-2005.
full.title: Gareth Thomas (Welsh politician)
